title: Gus Makes A Fuss
description: Need a pet sitter? Cassie and Lina are the girls for the task, as long as Gus the talking cat can keep out of trouble!Best friends Cassie and Lina would love to take a pet to the Pet Parade but it's not possible... until they're asked to pet sit Gus the cat next door.The girls might be 'ready for anything' but Gus isn't quite the cat they were expecting!Gus Makes A Fuss is the first book in the Pet Sitters series by Ella Shine, illustrated by Lisa Flanagan.
author: Ella Shine
